list-subject.subject_en: The status of document "$value(object_name)" has changed.

list-object.object_en:
This email is to notify you that the status of document "$value(object_name)", $value(title) has transitioned to $dqlvalue("select v.alias_value from d2_dictionary d,d2_dictionary_value v where d.object_name = v.dictionary_name and d.object_name = 'Domain Document Status Display' and d.alias_name='$value(r_object_type)' and v.object_name = '$value(a_status)' and v.i_position=d.i_position enable (ROW_BASED)") $value(r_version_label).
Click here to access the document
